text:
Bollywood star Priyanka Chopra has taken off for Los Angeles from Montreal to be a presenter at tge 88th Academy Awards.

“Staring into the sun... LA bound... Long flight! Yes! #Oscars,” Priyanka shared on her social media pages, along with a picture of her sporting shades while the sun shines on her face.

The actor is among star presenters who include Julianne Moore, Reese Witherspoon and Whoopi Goldberg.

Priyanka had earlier shared that she was expecting it to be an “insane night”. — IANS
title: Priyanka Chopra jets off to L.A.
